title: Using WebSockets in Quarkus
summary: The document describes how to implement WebSockets in a Quarkus application to facilitate real-time communication. It covers creating a new Quarkus project with WebSocket extension, building a simple chat application, handling WebSocket events, and testing the application. Additionally, it explains using WebSocket clients and provides guidance on setting up the client-server communication with annotated endpoints. Useful for developers interested in integrating WebSockets for interactive features in web apps.
